description: Signal Illumination A/C 38 mm Green and Signal Illumination A/C 38 mm Yellow
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Pyrotechnics for Department of National Defence
## Solicitation Information
- **Reference Number:** PW-23-01031184
- **Amendment Number:** 3
- **Solicitation Number:** W8486-217518/A
- **Publication Date:** 2023-03-30
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-06T14:00:00 (Expired)
- **Zip/Postal Code:** K1A0K2
- **Country:** Canada
## Requirement
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier to provide pyrotechnic items, specifically Signal Illumination A/C 38 mm Green and Signal Illumination A/C 38 mm Yellow. The 38mm Green and the 38mm Yellow signals are used by the Canadian Forces (CF) to provide a visual means of signaling ground to air, air to ground and ground to ground as warning, identification and location signals.
## QTY and Requirements
- Signal Illumination A/C 38 mm Green:
  - Quantities: 360 Units (2024), 720 Units (2025), 360 Units (2026), 720 Units (2027), 360 Units (2028), 360 Units (2029)
  - Unit of Issue: Each
- Signal Illumination A/C 38 mm Yellow:
  - Quantities: 540 Units (2024), 1080 Units (2025), 540 Units (2026), 540 Units (2027), 540 Units (2028), 540 Units (2029)
  - Unit of Issue: Each
## Delivery
- Delivery Locations: Canadian Forces Ammunition Depot (CFAD) Dundurn, Saskatchewan
- Required Delivery Date: Between 31 July and 30 September of each applicable year
## Trade Agreements and Procurement
- Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
## Security and Controlled Goods
- Security: There are no security requirements associated with this procurement
- Controlled Goods: This procurement is subject to the Controlled Goods Program
## Contact Information
- **Contact Name:** Caldwell, John
- **Contact Email:** john.caldwell@forces.gc.ca
- **Contact Address:** Department of National Defence, Directorate of Land Procurement
## Documents
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Note that an amendment is included in
